name: TERRORHYTHM (TRRT) - Rhythm driven action beat 'em up!
description: TERRORHYTHM - the music powered beat 'em up game. Follow the rhythm of music to defeat the security systems that keep any sound from the society. Upload your own MP3 collection and battle through your favourite tracks!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz+ Dual Core Processor or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Standard audio
